short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension sets currently.att.yahoo.com as your new tab and homepage, and sets your search engine to Currently from AT&T Search

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Premium content and utilities are all just a click away with the Currently Homepage Extension, powered by Yahoo! This unique homepage experience, brought to you by AT&T, will launch each time you open your browser to help you begin your tasks or exploration. 
Find what you need every time you open a tab:

- Top stories and trending topics
- Local weather and daily horoscopes 
- Engaging online games and crosswords 
- Easy access to your AT&T Mail powered by Yahoo
- Links to myAT&T and additional AT&T Services
- Looking for something else? Type in the search bar or toolbar to discover more

*This extension will set currently.att.yahoo.com as your homepage and new tab page.*
